statements: SELECT * FROM FinancialPerformanceForecast
SELECT Date, Revenue FROM FinancialPerformanceForecast
SELECT NetIncome, Expenses FROM FinancialPerformanceForecast WHERE Date <= '2022-01-31'
SELECT CashFlow FROM FinancialPerformanceForecast ORDER BY Date DESC
SELECT Revenue, Expenses, NetIncome FROM FinancialPerformanceForecast WHERE CashFlow >= 50000
SELECT Date, Revenue, NetIncome FROM FinancialPerformanceForecast WHERE NetIncome > 10000 ORDER BY Date DESC
SELECT Date, Revenue, Expenses, NetIncome, CashFlow FROM FinancialPerformanceForecast WHERE Expenses < 5000 ORDER BY Revenue ASC
SELECT * FROM FinancialPerformanceForecast WHERE Date > '2022-01-01' AND Revenue < 50000 ORDER BY Date ASC, Revenue DESC
SELECT Date, NetIncome FROM FinancialPerformanceForecast WHERE Date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY NetIncome DESC
SELECT Date, Revenue, Expenses, CashFlow FROM FinancialPerformanceForecast WHERE CashFlow < 0 AND Revenue > Expenses ORDER BY CashFlow ASC
SELECT * FROM financial_statements;
SELECT company_name, balance_sheet_equity FROM financial_statements WHERE balance_sheet_total_assets > 1000000;
SELECT company_name, income_statement_net_income FROM financial_statements ORDER BY income_statement_net_income DESC;
SELECT * FROM cash_flows WHERE net_cash_flow < 0;
SELECT company_name, operating_cash_flow, investing_cash_flow FROM cash_flows WHERE financing_cash_flow > 50000;
SELECT company_name, balance_sheet_total_assets FROM financial_statements WHERE balance_sheet_total_assets > 1000000 ORDER BY balance_sheet_total_assets DESC;
SELECT company_name, income_statement_net_income FROM financial_statements WHERE income_statement_net_income < 0 ORDER BY income_statement_net_income ASC;
SELECT company_name, balance_sheet_total_liabilities, balance_sheet_equity FROM financial_statements WHERE balance_sheet_total_liabilities > balance_sheet_equity;

SELECT company_name, income_statement_revenue, income_statement_expenses, income_statement_net_income FROM financial_statements WHERE income_statement_revenue > income_statement_expenses ORDER BY income_statement_net_income DESC;

SELECT company_name, operating_cash_flow, investing_cash_flow, financing_cash_flow, net_cash_flow FROM cash_flows WHERE operating_cash_flow > investing_cash_flow AND net_cash_flow > 0 ORDER BY net_cash_flow DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_statements
SELECT id, statement_type, statement_date FROM financial_statements ORDER BY statement_date DESC
SELECT id, total_assets, total_liabilities, total_equity FROM financial_statements WHERE total_assets > total_liabilities
SELECT * FROM cash_flows WHERE amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_date
SELECT id, performance_date, revenue FROM financial_performance
SELECT * FROM financial_statements WHERE statement_type='Income Statement' ORDER BY statement_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT statement_type, total_assets FROM financial_statements WHERE total_assets > 100000 ORDER BY total_assets ASC
SELECT * FROM cash_flows WHERE category='Investing' AND amount > 5000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_date, SUM(amount) AS total_cash_flow FROM cash_flows GROUP BY transaction_date HAVING total_cash_flow > 10000 ORDER BY total_cash_flow DESC
SELECT * FROM financial_performance WHERE revenue > expenses ORDER BY performance_date ASC
SELECT * FROM company_financials WHERE company_id = 1
SELECT year, revenue, net_profit FROM company_financials WHERE year = 2021
SELECT company_id, expenses FROM company_financials ORDER BY expenses DESC
SELECT * FROM cash_flows WHERE year BETWEEN 2019 AND 2020
SELECT company_id, return_on_investment FROM financial_ratios
SELECT * FROM company_financials WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT year, revenue, expenses FROM company_financials WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT company_id, year, operating_cash_flow FROM cash_flows WHERE year BETWEEN 2019 AND 2020;
SELECT * FROM financial_ratios WHERE company_id = 2 ORDER BY return_on_investment DESC;
SELECT forecast_id, company_id, forecast_date, forecasted_growth_rate FROM financial_forecasts WHERE forecasted_revenue > 1000000;
SELECT * FROM cash_flows ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, cash_inflow, cash_outflow FROM income_statement WHERE revenue > expenses;
SELECT date, liquidity FROM financial_performance WHERE liquidity > 1.5 ORDER BY liquidity DESC;
SELECT date, forecasted_cash_flow FROM forecasting WHERE forecasted_cash_flow > 10000;
SELECT date, assets, liabilities FROM balance_sheet WHERE liabilities > assets;
SELECT * FROM cash_flows WHERE cash_inflow > 10000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT date, revenue FROM income_statement WHERE expenses < 5000 ORDER BY revenue ASC;
SELECT date, liquidity FROM financial_performance WHERE profitability > 0.2 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM balance_sheet WHERE assets > liabilities ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT date, forecasted_cash_flow, forecasted_profitability FROM forecasting WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY forecasted_cash_flow DESC;
